timeline.message:
Add `doc` fields to script factory

This causes painless to generate the `docFields` method on every script
factory. It returns a `List<String>` containing all of the constant
keys passed to the `doc` variable's `get` method.

timeline.bodyText: We should probably only have this method if it's on the base factory.
timeline.author: jdconrad

timeline.message: Only generate method if asked for
Only generate method if asked for
